comment: Interesting book! It thought me alot about humanitarian law and had good discussions!
Ok book. Would have liked it to be a bit deeper
Excellent book, helped me alot during european union law studies.
A short and consise book for someone who wants an easy intruction to law
Good book, easy to read and understand
I think the book should have been a bit more detailed. Didn't give as much as I wished.
A good book when you want to develop your understanding of JavaScript.
Ok book, helped me understand Javascript on a deeper level. Good for webprogrammers.
I did'nt have much use of the book, I might need to learn more about JavaScript firts though.
Very interesting book, helped med with Javascript during web programming courses.
Got book for courses with database management systems where you also need to study the theori and design part!
Didn't do much for me. To much theory and to little actual sql and code.
Easy to understand and very useful learning code quality
Interesting and fun to read. I learnt alot about clean code
The book was ok.
Excellent book, helped me to understand how to improve my code quality a lot! Very useful book!
Interesting book, if you need to learn about Lord Leonard Hoffmann this is a book for you
Good book, worth reading
If you want to read about agile software development, how, trade offs etc this is a great book. Robert C. Martin is very intresting and gifted.
Gives good information on how to and when to use agile project techniques.
Ok book, if you need to learn about an agile process you probably would benefit from reading this book
Ok book, fun to read. Could have been more detailed.
Not as advanced book as I would have liked, unnecessary to read for me
Fun to read book, easy to understand and good examples and reading tips.
Ok book, helped me with legal theory
